title: Taco Smell
description: In the Taco Smell app, users can set a radius around themselves to be alerted whenever there is a Taco Bell within that distance. Gone are the days of driving by Taco Bells on highways with no warning. Gone are the days of traveling to a new city and missing out on the local TBells. Whenever you are on the move, you’ll always know when a Taco Bell is around.
